WebGPU_API.summary: The WebGPU API enables web developers to use the underlying system's GPU (Graphics Processing Unit) to carry out high-performance computations and draw complex images that can be rendered in the browser.

remarks.para: WebGPU is the successor to {{domxref("WebGL_API", "WebGL", "", "nocode")}}, providing better compatibility with modern GPUs, support for general-purpose GPU computations, faster operations, and access to more advanced GPU features.
